    Test_Usecase

    Test_Usecase.Rmd
    library(mandrake)
library(drake)
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)

source("mtcars/R/functions.R")
    # This is where you set up your workflow plan,
# a data frame with the steps of your analysis.

my_plan <- drake::drake_plan(
  report = knit(knitr_in("mtcars/report.Rmd"), file_out("mtcars/report.md"), quiet = TRUE),
  small = simulate(48),
  large = simulate(64),
  regression1 = target(
    reg1(data),
    transform = map(data = c(small, large), .tag_out = reg, .tag_in = cluster_id)
  ),
  regression2 = target(
    reg2(data),
    transform = map(data, .tag_out = reg, .tag_in = cluster_id)
  ),
  summ = target(
    suppressWarnings(summary(reg$residuals)),
    transform = map(reg, .tag_in = cluster_id)
  ),
  coef = target(
    suppressWarnings(summary(reg))$coefficients,
    transform = map(reg, .tag_in = cluster_id)
  ),

  unrelated = target(
    mtcars
  ),
  trace = TRUE
)

my_plan %>%
  dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across("command", rlang::as_label)) %>%
  knitr::kable("html")
    target command data regression1 cluster_id reg regression2 summ coef
    report <list> NA NA NA NA NA NA NA
    small <list> NA NA NA NA NA NA NA
    large <list> NA NA NA NA NA NA NA
    regression1_small <list> small regression1_small regression1 regression1_small NA NA NA
    regression1_large <list> large regression1_large regression1 regression1_large NA NA NA
    regression2_small <list> small regression1_small regression2 regression2_small regression2_small NA NA
    regression2_large <list> large regression1_large regression2 regression2_large regression2_large NA NA
    summ_regression1_small <list> small regression1_small summ regression1_small NA summ_regression1_small NA
    summ_regression1_large <list> large regression1_large summ regression1_large NA summ_regression1_large NA
    summ_regression2_small <list> small regression1_small summ regression2_small NA summ_regression2_small NA
    summ_regression2_large <list> large regression1_large summ regression2_large NA summ_regression2_large NA
    coef_regression1_small <list> small regression1_small coef regression1_small NA NA coef_regression1_small
    coef_regression1_large <list> large regression1_large coef regression1_large NA NA coef_regression1_large
    coef_regression2_small <list> small regression1_small coef regression2_small NA NA coef_regression2_small
    coef_regression2_large <list> large regression1_large coef regression2_large NA NA coef_regression2_large
    unrelated <list> NA NA NA NA NA NA NA 
    cache <- drake::get_cache()
#> Warning: get_cache() is deprecated. Use drake_cache() instead.
my_config <- drake_config(my_plan)
drake::make(config = my_config)
#> In drake, consider r_make() instead of make(). r_make() runs make() in a fresh R session for enhanced robustness and reproducibility.
#> All targets are already up to date.
    plan_extracted <- my_plan %>%
  extract_column_names(cache, group = "cluster_id") %>%
  dplyr::mutate(target_column_list = purrr::map_chr(target_column_list, yaml::as.yaml))
    my_config <- drake_config(plan_extracted)
    alert_behaviour <- function(){
  js <- "
  function(props) {
    alert('selected ' +  this.body.data.nodes.get(props.nodes[0]).label + 
           ': \\r\\n ======= \\r\\nCOLNAMES: \\r\\n' +
           this.body.data.nodes.get(props.nodes[0]).on_select_col);
  }"
}
    graph_info <- drake_graph_info(
  my_config,
  group = "cluster_id",
  clusters = c("summ", "coef"),
  build_times = FALSE,
  on_select_col = "target_column_list")
#> Warning in resolve_build_times(build_times): The build_times argument to the
#> visualization functions should be a character string: "build", "command",
#> or "none". The change will be forced in a later version of `drake`. see the
#> `build_times()` function for details.

render_drake_graph(
  graph_info,
  on_select = alert_behaviour())
